ComicInfo.Penciller: Greg Staples,Jake Lynch,John Burns,Patrick Goddard,Paul Marshall
ComicInfo.Summary:
KNIGHT TERRORS! What is the mysterious organisation known only as The Order? Find out in this week’s 2000 AD courtesy of Kek-W and John Burns’ new SF/fantasy saga. Also in this issue: Judge Dredd: Dark Justice by John Wagner and Greg Staples; Savage: Grinders by Pat Mills and Patrick Goddard; Ulysses Sweet: Psycho Therapist by Guy Adams and Paul Marshall; and Orlok: Eurozoned by Arthur Wyatt and Jake Lynch!
Cover: PJ Holden
Judge Dredd - Dark Justice (Part Three) (John Wagner - Greg Staples)Ulysses Sweet, Maniac For Hire - Psycho Therapist (Part Three) (Guy Adams - Paul Marshall)Orlok, Agent of East-Meg One - Eurozoned (Part Two) (Arthur Wyatt - Jake Lynch)The Order (Part Three) (Kek-W - John Burns)Savage Book 9 - Grinders (Part Three) (Pat Mills - Patrick Goddard)
